QuestData.Title: Didn't Stop to Think if They Should
QuestData.Description:
The sethrak seem to believe there's something in Nazmir that can unlock the destructive power of this gem.
We don't have that, but we have the next best thing. An insane warlock who is willing to experiment with magic.
Speak with Ingrid and have her begin the process to unlock the true power of this gem.
QuestData.LogDescription: Have Ingrid empower the Skycaller Gem.
